title: Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk IV
synopsis: The SD Gundams are at it again: first with a race among all of the prior SD Gundam characters, then the SD Zeons run a space travel agency in the second episode.
related_anime: ['Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk V', 'Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk III']
